name: Spanish Hangover
description:
Two aliens got drunk in Spain and they have to get back home.

This is puzzle game, transform yourself into different objects and living beings in order to advance in the story.

Controls

Move = keyboard arrows, controller joystick
Action = keyboard space, playstation square
Change camera = keyboard C, playstation triangle

Controls Blasphemous minigame

Move = keyboard arrows, controller joystick
Attack = keyboard space, playstation square
Roll = keyboard B, playstation circle

Music

Paco Diago - SoundCloud
